@RyanMeese @kaitcoaching Also kait for sure has it tougher than I ever did! Just trying to pass along some advice from someone who has seen close friends go through the exact same thing

@RyanMeese @kaitcoaching Thatâ€™s note what Iâ€™m saying. But donâ€™t feed the hate. 99% of trolls just wanna get an RT or a shoutout. Donâ€™t give em what they want is all Iâ€™m saying. And focus on the positive. Lol I think you misinterpreted my tweet!

@kaitcoaching Stop acknowledging the hate kait! (Rhymes for days) It just feeds it more! Youâ€™re all about the positivity so letâ€™s share all the positive tweets you receive! Itâ€™s so easy to get caught up in the trolls and not see the love!! Donâ€™t show the hate, show the love ;)
